author: Special Correspondent
text:
Alangulam police have arrested a youth for allegedly murdering three persons, including two women, at Nettoor near Alangulam in the district on Tuesday evening.

The police said that the accused, N. Muthuraj (32) of Nettoor under Alangulam police station limits, allegedly misbehaved with M. Mariammal (20) of the same area a couple of days ago, and her father Murugan filed a complaint with the police in this regard.

Agitated over this, Muthuraj allegedly hacked to death Mariammal, her mother M. Petchithai (45) and grandfather M. Govindasamy (80) with an ‘aruval’.
title: Three hacked to death
